content.body:
> <@ricea:matrix.org> I think `writable.write("something")` is okay, but generally I prefer the (also not specified) syntax `ReadableStream.from(["something"]).pipeTo(writable)` because it also closes the stream for you.

Wait that’s a thing? Is this implemented anywhere?
content.formatted_body:
In reply to @ricea:matrix.org
I think writable.write("something") is okay, but generally I prefer the (also not specified) syntax ReadableStream.from(["something"]).pipeTo(writable) because it also closes the stream for you.
Wait that’s a thing? Is this implemented anywhere?
